extraction_metadata.indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

DE.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy

Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 in combination with platinum-containing chemotherapy or after sequential therapy with an anti-PD-1/PD-L1 and platinum-containing chemotherapy and for whom a therapy other than docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy
PICOs.Comparator: patient-individual therapy, taking into account previous therapy and histology with selection of afatinib, pemetrexed, erlotinib, docetaxel in combination with ramucirumab, docetaxel in combination with nintedanib and vinorelbine

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: different chemotherapies without platinum (cisplatin/ carboplatin) as well as treatment with an immune checkpoint inhibitor as monotherapy

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in case of predominantly squamous histology)

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: pembrolizumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours (PD-L1 expression ≥ 1% of tumour cells))

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: docetaxel in combination with nintedanib (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and adenocarcinoma histology)

DK.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: adult patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior line of systemic therapy
adult patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation who have progressed after at least one prior line of systemic therapy

EN.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: previously treated KRAS G12C mutation-positive advanced non-small-cell lung cancer
previously treated KRAS G12C mutation-positive advanced non-small-cell lung cancer

FR.Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: adult patients with advanced CBNPC, with KRAS G12C mutation, whose disease has progressed after at least one prior systemic treatment line
adult patients with advanced CBNPC, with KRAS G12C mutation, whose disease has progressed after at least one prior systemic treatment line
patients treated with immunotherapy monotherapy in the first line
PICOs.Comparator: chemotherapy based on platinum salts, such as in the 1st line: cisplatin-vinorelbine, cisplatine-citagembine, carboplatin-paclitaxel, cisplain-docetaxel, Cisplatin-pemetrexed (non-epidermoid only)

PICOs.Population: patients treated with chemotherapeutic therapy + immunotherapies in the line 1
PICOs.Comparator: chemotherapists in the single line: pemetrexed, docetaxel (non-epidermoside only)

PICOs.Population: patients receiving first line bi-chemotherapy, without immunotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: immunotherapeutic treatment is the reference: atezolizumab, nivolumab or pembrolizimab (if PD-L1 ≥ 1%)

PICOs.Population: patients receiving first line bi-chemotherapy, without immunotherapy
patients receiving first line bi-chemotherapy, without immunotherapy
patients receiving first line bi-chemotherapy, without immunotherapy and with PD-L1 ≥ 1%
